      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int createFurnaceRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack source, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
      Returns the id of the Furnace Recipe created.
      Returns less than 0 when creation failed.
      Can fail if original recipes and recipe packs have not loaded yet (-1).
      Can fail if recipe exists already (-2).
      int createMultiRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] ingredients, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] results)
      Returns the id of the Multicraft Recipe created.
      Returns less than 0 when creation failed.
      Can fail if original recipes and recipe packs have not loaded yet (-1)
      Can fail if recipe exists already (-2).

      Returns the id of the Shapeless Recipe created.
      Returns less than 0 when creation failed.
      Can fail if original recipes and recipe packs have not loaded yet (-1).
      Can fail if recipe exists already (-2).

      Returns RecipeContainer of a Recipe.

    • Method Detail

      • createShapedRecipe

        public int createShapedRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] ingredients,
                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
        Returns the id of the Shaped Recipe created.
        Returns less than 0 when creation failed.
        Can fail if original recipes and recipe packs have not loaded yet (-1).
        Can fail if recipe exists already (-2).
        Parameters:
        ingredients - All ingredients in array of length 9. Order affects shape
        result - The result of the recipe
        Returns:
        The id of the created Shaped Recipe

      • createShapelessRecipe

        public int createShapelessRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] ingredients,
                                 org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
        Returns the id of the Shapeless Recipe created.
        Returns less than 0 when creation failed.
        Can fail if original recipes and recipe packs have not loaded yet (-1).
        Can fail if recipe exists already (-2).
        Parameters:
        ingredients - All ingredients in array. Order does not matter
        result - The result of the recipe
        Returns:
        The id of the created Shapeless Recipe

      • createFurnaceRecipe

        public int createFurnaceRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack source,
                               org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
        Returns the id of the Furnace Recipe created.
        Returns less than 0 when creation failed.
        Can fail if original recipes and recipe packs have not loaded yet (-1).
        Can fail if recipe exists already (-2).
        Parameters:
        source - Source itemstack to be burned
        result - The result of smelting
        Returns:
        The id of the created Furnace Recipe

      • createMultiRecipe

        public int createMultiRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] ingredients,
                             org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] results)
        Returns the id of the Multicraft Recipe created.
        Returns less than 0 when creation failed.
        Can fail if original recipes and recipe packs have not loaded yet (-1)
        Can fail if recipe exists already (-2).
        Parameters:
        ingredients - Array of length 16 of all ingredients. Order affects shape. OPTIONAL: Use toArray using ItemStack[4][4]
        results - Array of length 4 of all results. Order will affect result order
        Returns:
        The id of the created Multicraft Recipe

      • getRecipe

        public RecipeAPI.RecipeContainer getRecipe(RecipeAPI.RecipeType type,
                                           int id)
        Returns RecipeContainer of a Recipe.
        Returns null if id is incorrect.
        Parameters:
        type - RecipeType enum value for type of Recipe
        id - Recipe id
        Returns:
        The recipe container

      • removeRecipe

        public void removeRecipe(RecipeAPI.RecipeType type,
                         int id)
        Returns a recipe of specified type and id.
        Parameters:
        type - RecipeType enum value for type of Recipe to delete
        id - an integer value representing the recipe id

      • recipeCount

        public int recipeCount(RecipeAPI.RecipeType type)
        Returns size of recipe list of given type.
        Use with getRecipe method if going through all recipes
        Parameters:
        type - Type of recipe to search

      • getRecipes

        public java.util.List<RecipeAPI.RecipeContainer> getRecipes(RecipeAPI.RecipeType type)
        Returns a list of all recipe of a given type
        Parameters:
        type - Type of recipe
        Returns:
        recipes;
